data.title: Can I add Nintendo Switch users as a friend on my Wii U?
data.meta_description:
Answer: No. “Nintendo Network” and “Nintendo Account” are treated as separate accounts. Though they can be linked, no friends and such are shared between them. The Switch doesn’t have access to Nintendo Network, and the Wii U doesn’t have access to the Nintendo Account service.
